name: Spaced Out !
description:
Space is crazy ! Find yourself a planet to spend your days on, and relax a little bit.

Controls :

W/Z -> accelerate

S -> decelerate

A/Q -> turn left

D -> turn right

Mouse for clicking stuff

Try to get as far as you can !

Tip : Accelerate as fast as you can so that faster ships don't lock you into one direction.
